00001 /*
00002  *  objstr.h - NSString based string class with operators
00003  *  ========
00004  *

00010  *
00011  *  C++ classes to wrap up XCode classes for operator overload of
00012  *  useful operations such as access to NSArrays and NSDictionary
00013  *  by subscript or NSString operators such as + for concatenation.
00014  *
00015  *  This works as the Apple Objective-C compiler supports source
00016  *  which mixes C++ with objective C. To enable this: for each
00017  *  source file which will include/import this header file, select
00018  *  it in Xcode and open it's "Info". To enable mixed compilation,
00019  *  for the file's "File Type" select: "sourcecode.cpp.objcpp".

00055 /**
00056  Internal class representing a susbscript operation into a string to access or assign
00057  to individual characters or ranges
00058  
00059  Usage:
00060  <pre>
00061  OOString str <<= @"JOHN";
00062  if ( str[1] != 'O' )
00063  str[1] = 'O';
00064  </pre>
00065  */
00066 
00067 class OOStringSub {
00068     friend class OOString;
00069     NSMutableString *str;
00070     NSRange idx;
00071     oo_inline OOStringSub( NSMutableString *ref, int sub ) {
00072         str = ref;
00073         idx = NSMakeRange( sub < 0 ? [str length]+sub : sub, 1 );
00074     }
00075     oo_inline OOStringSub( NSMutableString *ref, const NSRange &sub ) {
00076         str = ref;
00077         idx = sub;
00078         if ( idx.location + idx.length == NSNotFound )
00079             idx.length = str.length - idx.location;
00080     }
00081 public:
00082 #if 0
00083     oo_inline BOOL isupper() {
00084         return isupper( (int)**this );
00085     }
00086     oo_inline BOOL islower() {
00087         return islower( (int)**this );
00088     }
00089 #endif
00090     oo_inline operator unichar () const {
00091         return **this;
00092     }
00093     oo_inline unichar operator * () const {
00094         return [str length]>idx.location ? [str characterAtIndex:idx.location] : 0; ///
00095     }
00096     oo_inline operator NSString * () const {
00097         ///OOPool pool;
00098         return [str substringWithRange:idx];
00099     }
00100     oo_inline OOStringSub & operator = ( unichar val ) {
00101         [str replaceCharactersInRange:idx withString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%c", val]];
00102         return *this;
00103     }
00104     oo_inline OOStringSub & operator = ( NSString *val ) {
00105         [str replaceCharactersInRange:idx withString:val];
00106         return *this;
00107     }
00108     oo_inline OOStringSub & operator = ( const char *val ) {
00109         return operator = ( [NSString stringWithUTF8String:val] );
00110     }
00111 };
00112 
00113 /**
00114  Internal class representing subscript by string which performs a search into the
00115  string. Assigning to for example str[@"BARRY"] = @"BAZ" will change all occurances
00116  of "BARRY" in the string to "BAZ".
00117  
00118  Usage:
00119  <pre>
00120  OOString str <<= @"BARRY is great";
00121  str[@"great"] = @"an egotist";
00122  </pre>
00123  */
00124 
00125 class OOStringSearch {
00126     friend class OOString;
00127     NSMutableString *str;
00128     NSString *idx;
00129     oo_inline OOStringSearch( NSMutableString *ref,  NSString *sub ) {
00130         str = ref;
00131         idx = sub;
00132     }
00133 public:
00134     oo_inline operator NSRange () const {
00135         return [str rangeOfString:idx];
00136     }
00137     oo_inline operator NSUInteger () const {
00138         return [str rangeOfString:idx].location;
00139     }
00140     oo_inline OOStringSearch & operator = ( NSString *replacement ) {
00141         OOPoolIfRequired;
00142         [str setString:[str stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:idx withString:replacement]];
00143         return *this;
00144     }
00145     oo_inline OOStringSearch & operator = ( const char *replacement ) {
00146         OOPoolIfRequired;
00147         *this = [NSString stringWithUTF8String:replacement];
00148         return *this;
00149     }
00150     oo_inline BOOL operator ! () const {
00151         return !str || [str rangeOfString:idx].location == NSNotFound;
00152     }
00153 };

00158 /**
00159  A string class wrapping around NSString with all the usual operators including subscript.
00160  OOStringArray is \#defined as OOArray<OOString> and OOStringDict is \#defined as OODictionary<OString>
00161  for convenience.
00162  
00163  Operators:
00164  <table cellspacing=0><tr><th>operator<th>inplace<th>binary<th>arguments
00165  <tr><td>assign<td>=<td>&nbsp;<td>String or NSString
00166  <tr><td>copy<td>&lt;&lt;=<td>&nbsp;<td>String or NSString
00167  <tr><td>append<td>+=<td>+<td>string or number
00168  <tr><td>remove<td>-=<td>-<td>string
00169  <tr><td>repeat<td>*=<td>*<td>count
00170  <tr><td>split<td>&nbsp;<td>/<td>string
00171  <tr><td>find<td><td>&amp;<td>pattern
00172  <tr><td>parse<td><td>^<td>pattern
00173  <tr><td>replace<td>|=<td>|<td>replace string = "/pat/with/"
00174  <tr><td>subscript<td>&nbsp;<td>[]<td>character number
00175  <tr><td>search<td>&nbsp;<td>[]<td>string
00176  </table>
00177  
00178  Usage:
00179  <pre>
00180  OOString str <<= @"The time is ";
00181  NSLog( "%@", *(str+ctime()) );
00182  </pre>
00183  */
00184 
00185 class OOString : public OOReference<NSMutableString *> {
00186 public:
00187     oo_inline OOString() {}
00188     oo_inline OOString( id val ) { set( val ); }
00189     oo_inline OOString( CFNullRef obj ) { set( (id)obj ); }
00190     oo_inline OOString( const OOString &str ) { *this = str; }
00191     oo_inline OOString( const OOStringSub &sub ) { *this = sub; }
00192     oo_inline OOString( const OOArraySub<OOString> &sub ) { *this = sub; }
00193     oo_inline OOString( const OODictionarySub<OOString> &sub ) { *this = sub; }
00194     oo_inline OOString( const OONode &sub );
00195     oo_inline OOString( const OONodeSub &sub );
00196     oo_inline OOString( const OONodeArraySub &sub );
00197     oo_inline OOString( int nilOrCapacity ) { *this = nilOrCapacity; }
00198     oo_inline OOString( NSMutableString *str ) { *this = str; }
00199     oo_inline OOString( NSString *str ) { *this = str; }
00200     oo_inline OOString( double val ) { *this += val; }
00201     oo_inline OOString( const char *val ) { 
00202         rawset( [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithUTF8String:val] );
00203     }
00204     oo_inline OOString( const char *val, int len, int encoding = NSUTF8StringEncoding ) { 
00205         rawset( [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithBytes:val length:len encoding:encoding] );
00206     }
00207     oo_inline OOString( OOData data, int encoding = NSUTF8StringEncoding ) {
00208         rawset( [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithData:*data encoding:encoding] );
00209     }
00210     oo_inline OOString( const OOStringArray &val ) {
00211         *this = val.join( @" " );
00212     }
00213     oo_inline OOData utf8Data() const {
00214         int len = [get() lengthOfBytesUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00215         char *bytes = (char *)malloc( len+1 );
00216         [get() getCString:bytes maxLength:len+1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00217         OOData out = [[NSData alloc] initWithBytesNoCopy:bytes length:len freeWhenDone:YES];
00218         [*out release];
00219         return out;
00220     }
00221 
00222     // basic operators
00223     oo_inline NSMutableString *operator & () const { return autoget(); }
00224     oo_inline operator const char * () const { return [get() UTF8String]; }
00225     oo_inline operator OOData () const { return utf8Data(); }
00226     oo_inline operator double () const { 
00227         unichar firstChar = (*this)[0];
00228         return iswdigit( firstChar ) || firstChar == '.' || firstChar == '-' || firstChar == '+' ?
00229         [get() doubleValue] : get() ? firstChar : 0;
00230     }
00231 
00232     oo_inline OOString capitals () { return [get() capitalizedString]; }
00233     oo_inline OOString toupper () { return [get() uppercaseString]; }
00234     oo_inline OOString tolower () { return [get() lowercaseString]; }
00235 
00236     // assignment
00237     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( NSMutableString *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00238     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( NSString *val ) { OOCopyImmutable( (NSMutableString *)val ); return *this; }
00239     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( int nilOrCapacity ) { set( nilOrCapacity ); return *this; }
00240     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const char *val ) { set( OOString(val).get() ); return *this; }
00241     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OOString &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00242     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OOStringSub &val ) { OOCopyImmutable( (NSMutableString *)val ); return *this; }
00243     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OOArraySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00244     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OODictionarySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00245     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OONodeArraySub &sub );
00246     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OONodeSub &sub );
00247     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OONode &sub );
00248     oo_inline OOString &operator = ( const OOTmpStr &val );
00249 
00250     // inplace operators - append, remove, repeat
00251     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( id val ) { [alloc() appendString:[val description]]; return *this; }
00252     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( int val ) { [alloc() appendFormat:@"%d", val]; return *this; }
00253     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( double val ) { [alloc() appendFormat:@"%f", val]; return *this; }
00254     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( const char *val ) { [alloc() appendString:OOString( val ).get()]; return *this; }
00255     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( NSMutableString *str ) { [alloc() appendString:str]; return *this; }
00256     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( NSString *str ) { [alloc() appendString:str ? str : @"<nil>"]; return *this; }
00257     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( const OOString &str ) { [alloc() appendString:str.get()]; return *this; }
00258     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( const OOArraySub<OOString> &str ) { [alloc() appendString:str.get()]; return *this; }
00259     oo_inline OOString &operator += ( const OODictionarySub<OOString> &str ) { [alloc() appendString:str.get()]; return *this; }
00260 
00261     oo_inline OOString &operator -= ( const OOString &str ) { alloc(); (*this)[str] = @""; return *this; }
00262     oo_inline OOString &operator *= ( NSUInteger count ) {
00263         NSString *str = [[get() copy] autorelease];
00264         *this = "";
00265         for ( int i=0 ; i<count ; i++ )
00266             *this += str;
00267         return *this;
00268     }
00269 
00270     // string comparison
00271     oo_inline BOOL operator == ( const char *str ) const { return [get() isEqualToString:OOString(str).get()]; }
00272     oo_inline BOOL operator != ( const char *str ) const { return !operator == ( str ); }
00273     oo_inline BOOL operator <  ( const char *str ) const { return [get() caseInsensitiveCompare:OOString(str).get()] == NSOrderedAscending; }
00274     oo_inline BOOL operator >= ( const char *str ) const { return !operator < ( str ); }
00275     oo_inline BOOL operator >  ( const char *str ) const { return [get() caseInsensitiveCompare:OOString(str).get()] == NSOrderedDescending; }

00282     oo_inline BOOL operator <= ( NSString *str ) const { return !operator > ( str ); }

00287     oo_inline BOOL operator >  ( NSMutableString *str ) const { return [get() caseInsensitiveCompare:str] == NSOrderedDescending; }
00288     oo_inline BOOL operator <= ( NSMutableString *str ) const { return !operator > ( str ); }
00289     oo_inline BOOL operator == ( const OOString &str ) const { return [get() isEqualToString:str.get()]; }

00371 // replicate string 
00372 inline OOString operator * ( const OOString &str, int count ) {
00373     OOString out = "";
00374     for ( int i=0 ; i<count ; i++ )
00375         out += str;
00376     return out;
00377 }

00380 template <typename ETYPE>
00381 inline OOString OOArray<ETYPE>::join( const OOString &sep ) const { 
00382     OOString out = "";
00383     for ( int i=0 ; i<*this ; i++ ) {
00384         if ( i )
00385             out += sep;
00386         out += (*this)[i];
00387     }
00388     return out;
00389 }
00390 
00391 template <typename ETYPE>
00392 inline OOString operator / ( const OOArray<ETYPE> &left, const OOString &sep ) {
00393     return left.join( sep );
00394 }

00397 inline OOArray<ETYPE> &OOArray<ETYPE>::operator = ( const char *val ) { *this = *(OOString(val) / @" "); return *this; }

00400 inline OODictionary<ETYPE> &OODictionary<ETYPE>::operator = ( const char *val ) { *this = *(OOString(val) / @" "); return *this; }

00418 template <typename ETYPE,typename RTYPE,typename STYPE>
00419 inline OODictionarySub<STYPE> OOSubscript<ETYPE,RTYPE,STYPE>::operator [] ( const char *sub ) const {

00421 }

00426     return *this;

00443 oo_inline static NSMutableString *OOFormat( const OOString &format, ... ) {
00444     va_list argp;
00445     va_start(argp, format);
00446     NSString *str = [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithFormat:format arguments:argp];
00447     va_end( argp );
00448     return (NSMutableString *)[str autorelease];
00449 }

00451 /*=================================================================================*/
00452 /*================================ Pattern matching classes =======================*/
00453 
00454 extern "C" {
00455 #include <regex.h>
00456 }
00457 
00458 /**
00459  A class to represent a patten matching operations against a string.
00460  
00461  Usage:
00462  <pre>
00463 OOStringArray words = OOPattern( @"\\w+" ).match();
00464  </pre>
00465  */
00466 
00467 class OOPattern {
00468     OOString pat;
00469 public:
00470     regex_t *regex;
00471 
00472     oo_inline OOPattern() {}
00473     oo_inline OOPattern( const OOString &patin, int flags = REG_EXTENDED ) { init( patin, flags ); }
00474     //oo_inline OOPattern( const char *patin, int flags = REG_EXTENDED ) { init( patin, flags ); }
00475 
00476     oo_inline void init( const OOString &patin, int flags );
00477     oo_inline int exec( const char *input, int matchmax = 0, regmatch_t matches[] = NULL, int eflags = 0 ) const {
00478         int error = regexec( regex, input, matchmax, matches, eflags );
00479         if ( error && error != REG_NOMATCH ) {
00480             char errbuff[1024];
00481             regerror( error, regex, errbuff, sizeof errbuff );
00482             OOWarn( @"OOPattern::exec() Regex match error: %s, in pattern'%@'", errbuff, *pat );
00483         }
00484         return error == 0;
00485     }
00486 
00487     oo_inline int find( const char *input, int matchmax, regmatch_t matches[] ) const {
00488         int nmatches = 0;
00489         for ( int pos = 0 ; exec( input+pos, matchmax-nmatches, matches+nmatches ) ; nmatches++ ) {
00490             matches[nmatches].rm_so += pos;
00491             pos = matches[nmatches].rm_eo += pos;
00492         }
00493         return nmatches;
00494     }
00495     oo_inline OOStringArray split( const OOString &str ) const {
00496         OOPoolIfRequired;
00497         const char *input = str;
00498         regmatch_t matches[100];
00499         OOStringArray out;
00500 
00501         for ( ; exec( input, sizeof matches/sizeof matches[0], matches ) ; input += matches[0].rm_eo )
00502             out += OOString( input, matches[0].rm_so );
00503         out += OOString( input );
00504 
00505         return out;
00506     }
00507     oo_inline OOStringArray match( const OOString &str ) const {
00508         OOPoolIfRequired;
00509         return match( [str UTF8String] ); 
00510     }
00511     oo_inline OOStringArray match( const char *str ) const {
00512         regmatch_t matches[100];
00513         OOStringArray out;
00514 
00515         for ( const char *input = str ; input && exec( input, sizeof matches/sizeof matches[0], matches ) ; input += matches[0].rm_eo )
00516             out += OOString( input+matches[0].rm_so, matches[0].rm_eo-matches[0].rm_so );
00517 
00518         return out;
00519     }
00520     oo_inline OOStringArray parse( const OOString &str ) const {
00521         OOPoolIfRequired;
00522         const char *input = str;
00523         regmatch_t matches[100];
00524         OOStringArray out;
00525 
00526         if ( exec( input, sizeof matches/sizeof matches[0], matches ) )
00527             for ( int i=0 ; i<=regex->re_nsub ; i++ )
00528                 out += matches[i].rm_so == -1 ? OOString( kCFNull ) :
00529                     OOString( input+matches[i].rm_so, matches[i].rm_eo-matches[i].rm_so );
00530 
00531         return out;
00532     }
00533 };
00534 
00535 inline OOStringArray operator & ( const OOString &str, const OOPattern &pattern ) { return pattern.match( str ); }
00536 inline OOStringArray operator & ( const OOString &str, const OOPattern *pattern ) { return str & *pattern; }
00537 inline OOStringArray operator & ( const OOString &str, const OOString  &patexpr ) { return str & OOPattern( patexpr ); }
00538 
00539 inline OOStringArray operator ^ ( const OOString &str, const OOPattern &pattern ) { return pattern.parse( str ); }
00540 inline OOStringArray operator ^ ( const OOString &str, const OOPattern *pattern ) { return str ^ *pattern; }
00541 inline OOStringArray operator ^ ( const OOString &str, const OOString  &patexpr ) { return str ^ OOPattern( patexpr ); }
00542 
00543 inline OOStringArray OOString::operator / ( const OOPattern &sep ) const {
00544     return sep.split( *this );
00545 }
00546 
00547 /**
00548  A class to represent a match and replace operations against a string.
00549  
00550  Usage:
00551  <pre>
00552  OOString quoted = OOReplace( @"/(\\w+)/'$1'/" ).exec();
00553  </pre>
00554  */
00555 
00556 class OOReplace {
00557     regmatch_t dmatches[100];
00558     OOPattern pattern;
00559     OOString replace;
00560     int dcount;
00561 
00562 public:
00563     oo_inline OOReplace() {}
00564     oo_inline OOReplace( const char *expr ) {
00565         init( expr );
00566     }
00567     oo_inline OOReplace( const OOString &expr ) {
00568         init( expr );
00569     }
00570     oo_inline OOReplace( const OOString &pat, const OOString &rep, int flags ) {
00571         init( pat, rep, flags );
00572     }
00573 
00574     oo_inline void init( const OOString &expr ) {
00575         OOStringArray split = expr / expr[NSMakeRange(0,1)];
00576         int flags = REG_EXTENDED;
00577 
00578         OOPool pool;
00579         for ( const char *options = *split[3] ; *options ; options++ )
00580             switch ( *options ) {
00581                 case 'i': flags |= REG_ICASE; break;
00582                 case 'm': flags |= REG_NEWLINE; break;
00583             }
00584 
00585         init( *split[1], *split[2], flags );
00586     }
00587     oo_inline void init( const OOString &pat, const OOString &rep, int flags ) {
00588         pattern.init( pat, flags );
00589         replace <<= rep;
00590 
00591         static OOPattern *dollarPattern;
00592         if ( !dollarPattern )
00593             dollarPattern = new OOPattern( "\\\\\\$|\\$[[:digit:]]+|\\${[[:digit:]]+}", REG_EXTENDED );
00594         OOPool pool;
00595         dcount = dollarPattern->find( replace, sizeof dmatches / sizeof dmatches[0], dmatches );
00596     }
00597 
00598     oo_inline OOString exec( const char *input ) const {
00599         OOPoolIfRequired;
00600         const char *dstr = replace;
00601         regmatch_t matches[100];
00602         OOString out;
00603 
00604         for ( ; pattern.exec( input, sizeof matches / sizeof matches[0], matches ) ; input += matches[0].rm_eo ) {
00605             out += OOString( input, matches[0].rm_so );
00606             int pos = 0;
00607             for ( int d=0 ; d<dcount ; d++ ) {
00608                 out += OOString( dstr+pos, dmatches[d].rm_so-pos );
00609                 const char *vptr = dstr+dmatches[d].rm_so+1; 
00610                 int v = atoi( *vptr == '{' ? vptr+1 : vptr );
00611                 out += *vptr == '$' ? OOString( vptr, 1 ) : OOString( input+matches[v].rm_so, matches[v].rm_eo-matches[v].rm_so );
00612                 pos = dmatches[d].rm_eo;
00613             }
00614             out += OOString( dstr+pos );
00615         }
00616 
00617         return out += OOString( input );
00618     }
00619 };
00620 
00621 inline OOString operator | ( const OOString &str, const OOReplace &replace ) { OOPoolIfRequired; return replace.exec( str ); }
00622 inline OOString operator | ( const OOString &str, const OOReplace *replace ) { return str | *replace; }
00623 inline OOString operator | ( const OOString &str, const OOString  &patrepl ) { return str | OOReplace( patrepl ); }
00624 
00625 inline OOString &operator |= ( OOString &str, const OOReplace &replace ) { return str = str | replace; }
00626 inline OOString &operator |= ( OOString &str, const OOReplace *replace ) { return str = str | replace; }
00627 inline OOString &operator |= ( OOString &str, const OOString  &patrepl ) { return str = str | patrepl; }
00628 
00629 /**
00630  A class to represent a C pointer inside an NSValue object for ref counting and
00631  so it can be stored inside the OSX buffs NSArray, NSDictionary etc.
00632  
00633  Usage:
00634  <pre>
00635  OOPointer<void *> ptr = malloc(1000);
00636  void *p = ptr;
00637  </pre>
00638  */
00639 
00640 template <typename PTYPE>
00641 class OOPointer : public OOReference<NSValue *> {
00642     PTYPE ptr;
00643 protected:
00644     oo_inline PTYPE pget() {
00645         return !*this ? NULL : ptr;
00646     }
00647     oo_inline NSValue *pset( NSValue *val ) {
00648         // recover pointer from NSValue object
00649         set( val );
00650         ptr = val == (id)kCFNull ? NULL : (PTYPE)[val  pointerValue];
00651         return val;
00652     }
00653     oo_inline PTYPE pset( PTYPE ptr ) {
00654         // store pointer in NSValue objects so it can be referrence counted
00655         [pset( [[NSValue alloc] initWithBytes:&ptr objCType:@encode(PTYPE)] ) release];
00656         return ptr;
00657     }
00658 public:
00659     oo_inline OOPointer() { }
00660     oo_inline OOPointer( PTYPE ptr ) { *this = ptr; }
00661     oo_inline OOPointer( NSValue *val ) { *this = val; }
00662     oo_inline OOPointer( const OOPointer &val ) { *this = val; }
00663 
00664     oo_inline operator PTYPE () { return pget(); }
00665     oo_inline PTYPE operator * () { return pget(); }
00666 
00667     oo_inline OOPointer &operator = ( PTYPE ptr ) { pset( ptr ); return *this;  }
00668     oo_inline OOPointer &operator = ( NSValue *val ) { pset( val ); return *this; }
00669     oo_inline OOPointer &operator = ( const OOPointer &val ) { pset( val.get() ); return *this; }
00670 };
00671 
00672 
00673 /**
00674  Initialisation for OOPattern class. Replaces \[wWdWsS] with character classes 
00675 for compatability with perl. All compiled reguar expressions are cached.
00676  */
00677 
00678 inline void OOPattern::init( const OOString &patin, int flags ) {
00679     pat <<= patin;
00680 
00681     static OODictionary<OOPointer<regex_t *> > cache;
00682     if ( !!cache[patin][flags] ) {
00683         regex = *cache[patin][flags];
00684         return;
00685     }
00686 
00687     OOPool pool;
00688     static BOOL patfix;
00689 
00690     if ( !patfix ) {
00691         static const char *shortcuts[] = {
00692             "w/$1[[:alnum:]]/", "W/$1[^[:alnum:]]/",
00693             "d/$1[[:digit:]]/", "D/$1[^[:digit:]]/",
00694             "s/$1[[:space:]]/", "S/$1[^[:space:]]/"};
00695         static int nfixes = sizeof shortcuts/sizeof *shortcuts;
00696         static OOReplace *patternShortcuts;
00697 
00698         if ( !patternShortcuts ) {
00699             int savefix = patfix;
00700             patfix = YES;
00701             patternShortcuts = new OOReplace[nfixes];
00702             for ( int i=0 ; i<nfixes ; i++ )
00703                 patternShortcuts[i].init( OOString("/(^|[^\\\\](\\\\\\\\)*)\\\\")+OOString(shortcuts[i]) );
00704             patfix = savefix;
00705         }
00706 
00707         for ( int i=0 ; i<nfixes ; i++ )
00708             pat |= patternShortcuts[i];
00709     }
00710 
00711     regex = new regex_t;
00712 
00713     int error = regcomp( regex, pat, flags );
00714     if ( error ) {
00715         char errbuff[1024];
00716         regerror( error, regex, errbuff, sizeof errbuff );
00717         OOWarn( @"OOPattern::init() Regex compilation error: %s, in pattern'%@'", errbuff, *pat );
00718         delete regex;
00719     }
00720     else
00721         cache[patin][flags] = regex;
00722 }
00723

00726 
00727 static jmp_buf oo_jmp_env;
00728 
00729 static void oo_trapper( int sig ) {
00730     NSLog( @"SIGNAL %d", sig );
00731     longjmp( oo_jmp_env, 1 );
00732 }
00733 
00734 inline int OOTrap() {
00735     signal( SIGSEGV, oo_trapper );
00736     signal( SIGBUS, oo_trapper );
00737     return setjmp( oo_jmp_env );
00738 }

00740 class OORequest;
00741 class OORequestSub {
00742     friend class OORequest;
00743     OORequest *req;
00744     OOString key;
00745     OORequestSub( OORequest *req, const OOString &key ) {
00746         this->req = req;
00747         this->key = key;
00748     }
00749 public:
00750     OORequestSub operator = ( OOString val );
00751 };

00753 /**
00754  Network request on which you can POST data or set HTP header values.
00755  */
00756 
00757 class OORequest : public OOReference<NSMutableURLRequest *> {
00758 public:
00759     NSURLResponse *theResponse;
00760     NSError *error;
00761     
00762     oo_inline OORequest() {}
00763     oo_inline OORequest( NSURL *url, 
00764                         NSURLRequestCachePolicy cachePolicy = NSURLRequestUseProtocolCachePolicy, 
00765                         NSTimeInterval timeoutInterval = 60. ) {
00766         rawset( [[NSMutableURLRequest alloc] initWithURL:url cachePolicy:cachePolicy timeoutInterval:timeoutInterval] );
00767     }
00768     oo_inline OORequest( OOString url ) {
00769         NSURL *URL = [[NSURL alloc] initWithString:url];
00770         rawset( [[NSMutableURLRequest alloc] initWithURL:URL] );
00771         [URL release];
00772     }
00773     oo_inline OORequest( const OORequest &req ) {
00774         set( req.get() );
00775     }
00776 
00777     oo_inline OORequest &operator = ( NSMutableURLRequest *val ) { 
00778         set( val ); return *this;
00779     }
00780     oo_inline OORequestSub operator [] ( OOString sub ) {
00781         return OORequestSub( this, sub );
00782     }
00783 
00784     oo_inline OORequest &property( const OOString &name, const OOString &value ) {
00785         [get() setValue:value forHTTPHeaderField:name];
00786         return *this;
00787     }
00788     oo_inline OORequest &post( NSData *data ) {
00789         [get() setHTTPMethod:@"POST"];
00790         property( @"Content-Encoding", @"application/x-www-form-urlencoded" );
00791         property( @"Content-Length", OOFormat(@"%d", [data length] ) );
00792         [get() setHTTPBody:data];
00793         return *this;
00794     }
00795     oo_inline OORequest &post( const OOString &str, NSStringEncoding encoding = NSUTF8StringEncoding ) {
00796         post( [urlEncode( str ) dataUsingEncoding:encoding allowLossyConversion:YES] );
00797         return *this;
00798     }
00799 
00800 
00801     static oo_inline NSString *urlEncode( NSString *text ) {
00802         NSMutableString *encoded = [NSMutableString string];
00803         for ( const char *iptr = [text UTF8String] ; iptr && *iptr ; iptr++ )
00804             if ( *iptr > 0 ) ///
00805                 [encoded appendFormat:@"%c", *iptr];
00806             else
00807                 [encoded appendFormat:@"%%%02x", *iptr&0xff];
00808 
00809         return encoded;
00810     }
00811 
00812     oo_inline OOData data() {
00813         OOPool pool;
00814         return [NSURLConnection sendSynchronousRequest:get() returningResponse:&theResponse error:&error];
00815     }
00816     OOString string() {
00817         OOPool pool;
00818         NSData *data = [NSURLConnection sendSynchronousRequest:get() returningResponse:&theResponse error:&error];
00819         CFStringRef textEncoding = (CFStringRef)[theResponse textEncodingName];
00820         CFStringEncoding coreEncoding = textEncoding ? CFStringConvertIANACharSetNameToEncoding( textEncoding ) : kCFStringEncodingUTF8;
00821         NSStringEncoding encoding = CFStringConvertEncodingToNSStringEncoding( coreEncoding );
00822         OOString out = [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithData:data encoding:encoding];
00823         [*out release];
00824         return out;
00825     }
00826 };
00827 
00828 inline OORequestSub OORequestSub::operator = ( OOString val ) {
00829     [req->get() setValue:val forHTTPHeaderField:*key];
00830     return *this;
00831 }
00832 
00833 /**
00834  OOURL to initialise strings from the network or files.
00835  */
00836 
00837 class OOURL : public OOReference<NSURL *> {
00838 public:
00839     NSError *error;
00840 
00841     oo_inline OOURL( NSString *url = OONil ) {
00842         setURL( url );
00843     }
00844     oo_inline OOURL( const OOString &url ) {
00845         setURL( url );
00846     }
00847     oo_inline void setURL( const OOString &url ) {
00848         if ( *url )
00849             rawset( [[NSURL alloc] initWithString:url] );
00850     }
00851     oo_inline OOString string( NSStringEncoding *encoding = NULL ) {
00852         OOPool pool;
00853         OOString out = [[NSMutableString alloc] initWithContentsOfURL:get() usedEncoding:encoding error:&error];
00854         [*out release];
00855         return out;
00856     }
00857     oo_inline OOData data( NSUInteger mask = 0 ) {
00858         OOPool pool;
00859         OOReference<NSData *> out = [[NSData alloc] initWithContentsOfURL:get() options:mask error:&error];
00860         [*out release];
00861         return out;
00862     }
00863     oo_inline id object() {
00864         return [NSKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithData:data()];
00865     }
00866     oo_inline OORequest request() const {
00867         return OORequest( get() );
00868     }
00869     oo_inline OOString post( const OOString &post ) {
00870         return request().post( post ).string();
00871     }
00872     OONode xml( int flags = 0 );
00873 };
00874 
00875 /**
00876  Placeholder for a file path, see OOResource, OODocument, OOTmpFile.
00877  */
00878 
00879 class OOFile : public OOURL {
00880 public:
00881     oo_inline OOFile( const OOString &path ) : OOURL( OONil ){
00882         setPath( path );
00883     }
00884     oo_inline OOFile( const OOString &name, const OOString &type ) : OOURL( OONil ){
00885         setPath( [[NSBundle mainBundle] pathForResource:name ofType:type] );
00886     }
00887     oo_inline void setPath( const OOString &path ) {
00888         if ( *path )
00889             rawset( [[NSURL alloc] initFileURLWithPath:path] );
00890     }
00891     oo_inline OOString path() const {
00892         return [get() path];
00893     }
00894     oo_inline NSDictionary *attr() {
00895         return [[NSFileManager defaultManager] attributesOfItemAtPath:path() error:&error];
00896     }
00897     oo_inline unsigned long long size() {
00898         return [attr() fileSize];
00899     }
00900 
00901     oo_inline BOOL exists() const {
00902         return [[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:path()];
00903     }
00904     oo_inline BOOL save( const OOString &string, NSStringEncoding encoding = NSUTF8StringEncoding ) const {
00905         return save( [*string dataUsingEncoding:encoding allowLossyConversion:YES] );
00906     }
00907     oo_inline BOOL save( const NSData *data, BOOL atomically = NO ) const {
00908         return [data writeToFile:path() atomically:atomically];
00909     }
00910     oo_inline BOOL save( id object ) const {
00911         return save( [NSKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:object] );
00912     }
00913 };
00914 
00915 /**
00916  Pathfinder for resources in applications.
00917  */
00918 
00919 class OOResource : public OOFile {
00920 public:
00921     oo_inline OOResource( const OOString &name ) : OOFile( OOString( nil ) ) {
00922         OOStringArray comps = name / @".";
00923         setPath( [[NSBundle mainBundle] pathForResource:**comps[0]
00924                                                  ofType:comps>1 ? **comps[1] : nil] );
00925     }
00926 };

00932 class OODocument : public OOFile {

00935 };

00946 /**
00947  Internal class for subscripted acces to defaults.
00948  */
00949 
00950 class OODefaultsSub : public OODictionarySub<OOString> {
00951     friend class OODefaults;
00952     oo_inline OODefaultsSub( const OODictionary<OOString> *root, id key ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( root, key ) {
00953     }
00954     oo_inline virtual id get() {
00955         id value = [[NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults] objectForKey:key];
00956         OODictionarySub<OOString>::set( value );
00957         return value != (id)kCFNull ? value : nil;
00958     }
00959     oo_inline virtual id set( id value ) {
00960         [[NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults] setObject:value forKey:key];
00961         return OODictionarySub<OOString>::set( value );
00962     }
00963 public:
00964     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( OOString val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00965     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( CFStringRef val ) { set( (id)val ); return *this; }
00966     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( NSString *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00967     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( NSArray *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00968     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( NSDictionary *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00969     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( long long val ) { set( [[NSNumber numberWithLongLong:val] stringValue] ); return *this; }
00970     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( double val ) { set( [[NSNumber numberWithDouble:val] stringValue] ); return *this; }
00971     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( float val ) { set( [[NSNumber numberWithFloat:val] stringValue] ); return *this; }
00972     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( int val ) { set( [[NSNumber numberWithInt:val] stringValue] ); return *this; }
00973     oo_inline OODefaultsSub &operator = ( BOOL val ) { set( [[NSNumber numberWithBool:val] stringValue] ); return *this; }
00974     oo_inline operator long long () { return [get() longLongValue]; }
00975     oo_inline operator double () { return [get() doubleValue]; }
00976     oo_inline operator float () { return [get() floatValue]; }
00977     oo_inline operator BOOL () { return [get() boolValue]; }
00978     oo_inline operator int () { return [get() intValue]; }
00979     oo_inline operator NSDictionary * () { return get(); }
00980     oo_inline operator NSString * () { return get(); }
00981     oo_inline operator NSArray * () { return get(); }
00982     oo_inline OOString operator ~ () {
00983         [[NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults] removeObjectForKey:key];
00984         return OODictionarySub<OOString>::operator ~ ();
00985     }
00986 };
00987 
00988 /**
00989  Binds defaults to an OODictionary.
00990  */
00991 
00992 class OODefaults : public OODictionary<OOString> {
00993 public:
00994     oo_inline OODefaults() {
00995         OOPool pool;
00996         rawset( [[[NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults] dictionaryRepresentation] mutableCopy] );
00997     }
00998     oo_inline OODefaultsSub operator[] ( id key ) const {
00999         return OODefaultsSub( this, key );
01000     }
01001     oo_inline OODefaultsSub operator[] ( const OOString &key ) const {
01002         return OODefaultsSub( this, key );
01003     }
01004     oo_inline OODefaultsSub operator [] ( const CFStringRef sub ) const {
01005         return (*this)[(id)sub];
01006     }
01007     oo_inline void sync() {
01008         [[NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults] synchronize];
01009     }
01010     oo_inline ~OODefaults()  {
01011         sync();
01012     }
01013 };

01026 /**
01027  Shortcut for creating alerts.
01028  */
01029 
01030 class OOAlert {
01031 public:
01032     oo_inline OOAlert( OOString msg, id del = nil, 
01033             OOString cancel = @"OK", OOString b1 = nil, OOString b2 = nil ) {
01034 #ifdef __IPHONE_OS_VERSION_MIN_REQUIREDDDD
01035         [[[[UIAlertView alloc] initWithTitle:*OOPlist()[@"CFBundleDisplayName"] message:msg delegate:del
01036                            cancelButtonTitle:cancel otherButtonTitles:*b1, *b2, nil] autorelease] show];
01037 #else
01038         OOWarn( @"Alert: %@", *msg );
01039 #endif
01040     }
01041 };

01046 /**
01047  A wrapper for a number using NSNumber so it can be put in an NSArray or NSDictionary
01048  */
01049 
01050 class OONumber : public OOReference<NSNumber *> {
01051 public:
01052     oo_inline OONumber( double d ) {
01053         rawset( [[NSNumber alloc] initWithDouble:d] );
01054     }
01055     oo_inline OONumber( NSNumber *val ) {
01056         set( val );
01057     }
01058 
01059     oo_inline operator NSNumber * () const { return get(); } 
01060     oo_inline operator double () const { return [get() doubleValue]; } 
01061     oo_inline double operator * () const { return [get() doubleValue]; }
01062 
01063     oo_inline OONumber &operator = ( const OONumber &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
01064     oo_inline OONumber &operator += ( double val ) { return *this = *this + val; }
01065     oo_inline OONumber &operator -= ( double val ) { return *this = *this - val; }
01066     oo_inline OONumber &operator *= ( double val ) { return *this = *this * val; }
01067     oo_inline OONumber &operator /= ( double val ) { return *this = *this / val; }
01068     oo_inline OONumber operator + ( double val ) const { return **this + val; }
01069     oo_inline OONumber operator - ( double val ) const { return **this - val; }
01070     oo_inline OONumber operator * ( double val ) const { return **this * val; }
01071     oo_inline OONumber operator / ( double val ) const { return **this / val; }
01072 };
01073 
01074 /**
01075  A fledgling wrapper for NSScanner which didn't really pan out...
01076  */
01077 
01078 class OOScan {
01079     OOReference<NSScanner *> scan;
01080 public:
01081     oo_inline OOScan( const OOString &input ) {
01082         [*(scan = [[NSScanner alloc] initWithString:input]) release];
01083     }
01084 
01085     oo_inline OOString operator & ( NSString *str ) {
01086         NSString *out = nil;
01087         [*scan scanString:str intoString:&out];
01088         return out;
01089     }
01090     oo_inline OOString operator | ( NSString *str ) {
01091         NSString *out = nil;
01092         [*scan scanUpToString:str intoString:&out];
01093         return out;
01094     }
01095     oo_inline OOScan &operator >> ( double &d ) {
01096         [*scan scanDouble:&d];
01097         return *this;
01098     }
01099     oo_inline OOScan &operator >> ( float &f ) {
01100         [*scan scanFloat:&f];
01101         return *this;
01102     }
01103     oo_inline OOScan &operator >> ( int &i ) {
01104         [*scan scanInt:&i];
01105         return *this;
01106     }
01107 };
